MenuItem.Name: menuItem

Node.Name: face
Node.Script: local vs = {} local num = 20 for i = 0, num do local angle = 2*math.pi*i/num table.insert(vs,oVec2(radius*math.cos(angle),radius*math.sin(angle))+oVec2(radius,radius)) end face:addChild(oLine(vs,ccColor4()))

MenuItem.Script: menuItem:slots("TapBegan",function() face:perform(scale) end) menuItem:slots("TapEnded",function() if not fade.done then face:stopAction(fade) end face:runAction(fade) end)
